ygData.subject: Re: Factions
ygData.msgSnippet: My standing in Neriak is perfectly fine. I only killed Deathfist orcs which raises faction with Neriak and Freeport. I have not yet travelled to Crushbone.
ygData.messageBody:
My standing in Neriak is perfectly fine.

I only killed Deathfist orcs which raises faction with Neriak and Freeport.
I have not yet travelled to Crushbone. THough I am going. Emperor Crush
and his court don't reduce faction with Neriak, with the exception of Dvinn.
I won't be killing Dvinn though.

I may be a bit of a Rogue, but I am loyal to my race.

Bael
Warrior of the 16th rank
Indigo Brotherhood.


-----Original Message-----
From: Mifsud, Micael <Michael.Mifsud@...>
To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com' <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 2:59 AM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Factions


>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>hmmm if you kill enough orcs you will alienate Neriak, if you do this no
>where to train or buy food without help until you kill enough deathfist
orcs
>to raise faction with Freeport to buy and sell.
>
>May I also ask why you are a race traitor? Must every DE be a Drizzt? If
>you want to be accepted in fayder be a wood elf. Sorry but it really
>irritates me seeing so many "evil" races pandering to the good guys.
>
>Jaade D'Vinn
>23rd Circle of the Azure Bonds
>
>> ----------
>> From: Tom Swift[SMTP:tswift@...]
>> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> Sent: Saturday, June 12, 1999 4:22 PM
>> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Factions
>>
>> From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>>
>> Pansa,
>>
>> You know me as Aelyn the ranger but I also have a dark elf warrior.
>> Faction is very tough to improve. I have killed enough orcs to allow
>> myself
>> freedom to move around in freeport.
>>
>> But what you are trying to overcome is not simply faction, it is racial
>> hatred. It is noble of you to try and overcome the basic mistrust and
>> hatred that the Feir'dal have for the Tier'dal, but I know of no way you
>> could reverse that basic hatred all wood elves have for dark elves.
>>
>>
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Mallachyte@... <Mallachyte@...>
>> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>> Date: Friday, June 11, 1999 6:07 PM
>> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Factions
>>
>>
>> >From: Mallachyte@...
>> >
>> >While we are on factions, I have a non-warrior related request for
>> everyone.
>> >As another character, I play a Dark Elf Shadow Knight. Again, on the
>> Bertoxx
>> >server. I left Neriak at level 3, and traveled to the land of Faydwer.
>> I
>> >got an invis, and ran to CB cave, hopping to raise my faction enough to
>> allow
>> >me into the city. Alas, I am now level 12, and I have recently been
>> informed
>> >that I can NEVER change the faction with the elves. Somewhat upset, I
>> >arranged for an invis to the dwarven lands, in hopes of acceptance
there.
>> >But, as the time for my departure drew near, I ambandoned leaving,
>> refusing
>> >to belive nothing could be done. So, I decided to start a petition of
>> sorts
>> >to help change this. So, what I propose is that they allow me to change
>> my
>> >faction standings, just make it take a while. I know humans are not
>> looked
>> >upon as the greatest of friends to the elves, so let's say that it takes
>> 200
>> >orc kills for them to go from one fac level to the next. So, make if
400
>> >orcs for me to go from one to the next. Or maybe more like 600. Make
it
>> >hard, but not impossable. Anyway, I ask you to sent them feedback
asking
>> for
>> >this, because I would like to be able to walk outside without a guard
>> walking
>> >by and killing me.
>> >
